content: I'm trying to file a lawsuit against the company that sold me a defective product. Can you help me with the process?

I'd be happy to assist you. To start, can you provide me with more information about the product and when you purchased it? Additionally, do you have any receipts or documentation related to the purchase?
Yes, I have all my receipts and documents right here. Can you tell me what kind of information you need from them?

I'll need to see the serial number of the product, as well as any relevant warranty or return information. Can you also provide me with a detailed description of the problem you're experiencing with the product?
The problem is that it keeps overheating and causing damage to my other electronics. I've tried cleaning it out, but nothing seems to work.
